==  Words Danish Så ==

==== Så ====

Like in the discussion of "hvor" in "hun ved, hvor svært det kan være" (see the discussion under [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/verbs.html  verbs ], relatives) we have been troubled by examples with "så AN ..., at ..." ("so AN ... that ..."). Here we have chosen to analyse "så" as a modifier to the AN, and "at" as a nominal object to "så", like this:

http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/figs/stine06.png

For analysis of "så længe + [sentence]", see the paragraph "Relatives" under [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/verbs Verbs].
